com.complexible.common.nio.file

Class Paths2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.nio.file.Paths2

  • public final class Paths2
extends Object

    Utility class for working with Path

    Since:
    5.0

      Convenience wrapper for Files.list(java.nio.file.Path) which simply wraps the checked IOException as an UncheckedIOException.
      static long size(java.nio.file.Path theFile)
      Convenience wrapper for Files.size(java.nio.file.Path); returns the file size or 0L if the file does not exist like File.length().

      • withJarFileSystem

        public static java.nio.file.Path withJarFileSystem(String thePath,
                                                   Class<?> theClass)
        Returns a Path object for the given context using a new jar-based FileSystem. The new FileSystem probably needs to be closed after using the Path object.

      • list

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.nio.file.Path> list(java.nio.file.Path theFile)
        Convenience wrapper for Files.list(java.nio.file.Path) which simply wraps the checked IOException as an UncheckedIOException.
        Parameters:
        theFile - the file
        Returns:
        the result of Files.list(java.nio.file.Path)
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if Files.list(java.nio.file.Path) throws an IOException

      • size

        public static long size(java.nio.file.Path theFile)
        Convenience wrapper for Files.size(java.nio.file.Path); returns the file size or 0L if the file does not exist like File.length().
        Parameters:
        theFile - the file
        Returns:
        the result of Files.size(java.nio.file.Path), or 0L if the file does not exist
